text: @MSNBC @VaughnHillyard Well then unfortunately many Arizona residents WILL die from Covid19. Scientists have already started thousand times that unless they take measures to shut down bars, restaurants and other crowded indoor places, there will be NO STOPPING COVID19 infection.
